title: PhoneWindow holds onto Activity instance
body:
```
┬───
│ GC Root: Thread object
│
├─ java.lang.Thread instance
│    Leaking: NO (the main thread always runs)
│    Thread name: 'main'
│    ↓ Thread.threadLocals
│             ~~~~~~~~~~~~
├─ java.lang.ThreadLocal$ThreadLocalMap instance
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    Retaining 1.3 MB in 24626 objects
│    ↓ ThreadLocal$ThreadLocalMap.table
│                                 ~~~~~
├─ java.lang.ThreadLocal$ThreadLocalMap$Entry[] array
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    Retaining 1.3 MB in 24625 objects
│    ↓ ThreadLocal$ThreadLocalMap$Entry[17]
│                                      ~~~~
├─ java.lang.ThreadLocal$ThreadLocalMap$Entry instance
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    Retaining 1.0 MB in 20854 objects
│    ↓ ThreadLocal$ThreadLocalMap$Entry.value
│                                       ~~~~~
├─ android.animation.AnimationHandler instance
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    Retaining 1.0 MB in 20853 objects
│    ↓ AnimationHandler.mAnimatorRequestors
│                       ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
├─ android.util.ArraySet instance
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    Retaining 1.0 MB in 20844 objects
│    ↓ ArraySet.mArray
│               ~~~~~~
├─ java.lang.Object[] array
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    Retaining 1.0 MB in 20842 objects
│    ↓ Object[0]
│            ~~~
├─ android.view.ViewRootImpl instance
│    Leaking: YES (ViewRootImpl#mView is null)
│    Retaining 1.0 MB in 20841 objects
│    mContext instance of com.android.internal.policy.DecorContext, wrapping activity com.vanniktech.flashcards.
│    FlashcardsDeckActivity with mDestroyed = true
│    mWindowAttributes.mTitle = "com.vanniktech.flashcards/com.vanniktech.flashcards.FlashcardsDeckActivity"
│    mWindowAttributes.type = 1
│    ↓ ViewRootImpl.mContext
├─ com.android.internal.policy.DecorContext instance
│    Leaking: YES (ViewRootImpl↑ is leaking and DecorContext wraps an Activity with Activity.mDestroyed true)
│    Retaining 193 B in 9 objects
│    mBase instance of android.app.ContextImpl
│    ↓ DecorContext.mPhoneWindow
├─ com.android.internal.policy.PhoneWindow instance
│    Leaking: YES (DecorContext↑ is leaking and Window#mDestroyed is true)
│    Retaining 485.6 kB in 9622 objects
│    mContext instance of com.vanniktech.flashcards.FlashcardsDeckActivity with mDestroyed = true
│    mOnWindowDismissedCallback instance of com.vanniktech.flashcards.FlashcardsDeckActivity with mDestroyed = true
│    ↓ Window.mContext
╰→ com.vanniktech.flashcards.FlashcardsDeckActivity instance
     Leaking: YES (ObjectWatcher was watching this because com.vanniktech.flashcards.FlashcardsDeckActivity received
     Activity#onDestroy() callback and Activity#mDestroyed is true)
     Retaining 464.0 kB in 9460 objects
     key = 17980618-37af-47a0-b53e-d1f49386b92b
     watchDurationMillis = 1469139
     retainedDurationMillis = 1464138
     mApplication instance of com.vanniktech.flashcards.FlashcardsApplication
     mBase instance of androidx.appcompat.view.ContextThemeWrapper

METADATA

Build.VERSION.SDK_INT: 33
Build.MANUFACTURER: Google
LeakCanary version: 2.9.1
App process name: com.vanniktech.flashcards
Class count: 29347
Instance count: 240663
Primitive array count: 150344
Object array count: 32558
Thread count: 65
Heap total bytes: 31418839
Bitmap count: 3
Bitmap total bytes: 152607
Large bitmap count: 0
Large bitmap total bytes: 0
Db 1: open /data/user/0/com.vanniktech.flashcards/databases/com.google.android.datatransport.events
Db 2: open /data/user/0/com.vanniktech.flashcards/databases/Flashcards.db
Db 3: open /data/user/0/com.vanniktech.flashcards/no_backup/androidx.work.workdb
Stats: LruCache[maxSize=3000,hits=127022,misses=238582,hitRate=34%]
RandomAccess[bytes=12078602,reads=238582,travel=98376178840,range=39508269,size=46023935]
Analysis duration: 53858 ms
```
